General.Name: Henan Zhongfu Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Zhongfu Industrial Co.,Ltd processes, manufactures, and sells electrolytic aluminum and aluminum products in China. It offers high-grade double zero aluminum foil wool, high-grade printing plate substrates, other high performance alloy plates, auto sheets, anodized aluminum strips, and can stocks. The company also provides electronic product profiles, industrial profiles, building profiles, and car profiles; and wire rods consisting of rivet materials, aluminum alloy wire materials, extruded aluminum tube materials, materials for deoxidation in steel mills, and wire and cable materials. In addition, it is involved in the thermal power generation, as well as coal production activities. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Gongyi, China.
